headline: Enphase Energy (ENPH) Valuation Check After Strong Earnings Guidance And Tariff Relief News
summary: Enphase Energy (ENPH) has moved back into the spotlight after reporting Q4 2025 results that topped expectations, issuing Q1 2026 revenue guidance above consensus, and benefiting from a tariff ruling that may ease input costs. See our latest analysis for Enphase Energy. The stock has bounced hard in recent months, with a 90 day share price return of 68.03% and a 30 day share price return of 17.99%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return is still down 29.54%, so recent momentum follows a...
